Verses: 1 avar Thammudaiya Pannirandu Seesharaiyum Varavazhaiththu, Sagala Pisaasugalaiyum Thuraththavum, Viyaadhiyullavargalaik Gunamaakkavum Avargalukku Vallamaiyum Adhigaaramum Koduththu,
2 dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaikkuriththup Pirasangikkavum, Piniyaaligalaich Sosthamaakkavum Avargalai Anuppinaar.
3 appozhudhu Avar Avargalai Nokki: Vazhikkuth Thadiyaiyaavadhu Paiyaiyaavadhu Appaththaiyaavadhu Kaasaiyaavadhu Eduththukkondu Pogavendaam; Irandu Angigalaik Kondupogavum Vendaam.
4 endha Veettile Piravesikkireergalo, Ange Thangi, Angirundhu Purappadungal.
5 ungalai Etrukkollaadhavargal Evargalo Avargaludaiya Ooraivittu Neengal Purappadumpodhu, Avargalukkuch Saatchiyaaga Ungal Kaalgalil Padindha Thoosiyai Udharippodungal Endraar.
6 avargal Purappattuppoi, Giraamangaldhorum Thirindhu, Engum Suviseshaththaip Pirasangiththu, Piniyaaligalaik Gunamaakkinaargal.
7 appozhudhu Kaarpangu Dhesaadhipadhiyaagiya Erodhu Avaraal Seyyappatta Yaavaiyum Kelvippattadhumandri; Silar Yovaan Mariththorilirundhu Ezhundhaan Endrum,
8 silar Eliyaa Thondrinaan Endrum, Veru Silar Poorvakaalaththuth Theerkkadharisigalil Oruvan Uyirththezhundhaan Endrum Sollikkondapadiyaal, Kalakkamadaindhu:
9 yovaanai Naan Sirachchedhampanninen, Ivan Ippadippattavaigalaich Seygiraan Endru Kelvippadugirene! Ivan Yaar? Endru Erodhu Solli, Avaraip Paarkka Virumbinaan.

10 apposthalar Thirumbivandhu, Thaangal Seydha Yaavaiyum Avarukku Vivariththuch Sonnaargal. Appozhudhu Avar Avargalaik Koottikkondu, Thaniththirukkumpadi Pedhsaayidhaa Ennum Pattanaththaich Serndha Vanaandharamaana Oru Idaththukkup Ponaar.
11 janangal Adhai Arindhu, Avar Pinne Ponaargal, Avargalai Avar Etrukkondu, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaik Kuriththu Avargaludane Pesi, Sosthamadaiyavendumendrirundhavargalaich Sosthappaduththinaar.

12 saayangaalamaagirapodhu, Panniruvarum Serndhuvandhu, Avarai Nokki: Naam Irukkira Idam Vanaandharamaayirukkiradhu, Sutriyirukkira Oorgalilum Giraamangalilum Janangal Poith Thangi, Pojanapadhaarththangalaich Sampaadhiththukkollumpadi Avargalai Anuppividavendum Endraargal.

13 avar Avargalai Nokki: Neengale Avargalukkup Pojanankodungal Endraar. Adharku Avargal: Engalidaththil Aindhu Appangalum Irandu Meengalumaaththiramundu, Indha Janangalellaarukkum Pojanangodukkavendiyadhaanaal, Naangal Poi Vaangikkonduvaravendume Endraargal.
14 erakkuraiya Aiyaayiram Purushar Irundhaargal. Avargalaip Pandhikku Aimbadhu, Aimbadhuperaaga, Utkaarumpadi Sollungal Endru Thammudaiya Seeshargalukkuch Sonnaar.
15 avargal Andhappadiye Ellaaraiyum Utkaarumpadi Seydhaargal.

16 appozhudhu Avar Andha Aindhu Appangalaiyum Andha Irandu Meengalaiyum Eduththu, Vaanaththai Annaandhu Paarththu, Avaigalai Aaseervadhiththu, Pittu Janangalmun Vaikkumpadi Seeshargalidaththil Koduththaar.
17 ellaarum Saappittuth Thirupdhiyadaindhaargal. Meedhiyaana Thunikkaigal Pannirandu Koodainiraiya Edukkappattadhu.
18 pinbu Avar Thamadhu Seesharode Koodath Thaniththu Jebampannikkondirukkaiyil, Avargalai Nokki: Janangal Ennai Yaar Endru Sollukiraargal Endru Kettaar.
19 adharku Avargal: Silar Ummai Yovaansnaanan Endrum, Silar Eliyaa Endrum, Veru Silar Poorvakaalaththuth Theerkkadharisigalil Oruvar Uyirththezhundhaar Endrum Sollugiraargal Endraargal.
20 appozhudhu Avar: Neengal Ennai Yaar Endru Sollugireergal Endru Kettaar; Pedhuru Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neer Dhevanudaiya Kiristhu Endraan.
21 appozhudhu Avargal Adhai Oruvarukkum Sollaadhabadikku Urudhiyaaik Kattalaiyittaar.

22 melum Manushakumaaran Pala Paadugalpadavum, Moopparaalum Piradhaana Aasaariyaraalum Vedhapaaragaraalum Aagaadhavanendru Thallappadavum, Kollappadavum, Moondraamnaalil Uyirththezhundhirukkavum Vendum Endru Sonnaar.
23 pinbu Avar Ellaaraiyum Nokki: Oruvan En Pinne Vara Virumbinaal, Avan Thannaith Thaan Veruththu, Than Siluvaiyai Anudhinamum Eduththukkondu, Ennaip Pinpatrakkadavan.
24 than Jeevanai Ratchikka Virumbukiravan Adhai Izhandhupovaan; Ennimiththamaagath Than Jeevanai Izhandhupogiravan Adhai Ratchiththukkolluvaan.
25 manushan Ulagamuzhuvadhaiyum Aadhaayappaduththikkondaalum, Thannaith Thaan Keduththu Nashtappaduththinaal Avanukku Laabam Enna?

26 ennaikkuriththum En Vaarththaigalaik Kuriththum Evan Vetkappadugiraano, Avanaikkuriththu Manushakumaaran Thammudaiya Magimaiyodum Pidhaavin Magimaiyodum Parisuththa Thoodhargalin Magimaiyodum Varumpodhu Vetkappaduvaar.
27 inge Nirkiravargalil Silar Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaik Kaanumun, Maranaththai Rusipaarppadhillaiyendru Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
28 indha Vaarththaigalai Avar Solli Erakkuraiya Ettu Naalaanapinbu, Avar Pedhuruvaiyum Yovaanaiyum Yaakkobaiyum Koottikkondu, Jebampannukiradharku Oru Malaiyinmel Erinaar.
29 avar Jebampannugaiyil, Avarudaiya Mugaroobam Maaritru, Avarudaiya Vasthiram Venmaiyaagip Piragaasiththadhu.
30 andriyum Mose Eliyaa Ennum Iranduperum Magimaiyode Kaanappattu, Avarudane Sampaashanaipanni,
31 avar Erusalemile Niraivetrappogira Avarudaiya Maranaththaikkuriththup Pesikkondirundhaargal.
32 pedhuruvum Avanodirundhavargalum Niththiraimayakkamaayirundhaargal. Aagilum Avargal Vizhiththu Avarudaiya Magimaiyaiyum Avarode Nindra Avvirandu Peraiyum Kandaargal.

33 avviruvarum Avarai Vittup Pirindhupogaiyil, Pedhuru Yesuvai Nokki: Aiyare, Naam Inge Irukkiradhu Nalladhu, Umakku Oru Koodaaramum, Mosekku Oru Koodaaramum, Eliyaavukku Oru Koodaaramumaaga, Moondru Koodaarangalaip Poduvom Endru, Thaan Sollugiradhu Innadhendru Ariyaamal Sonnaan.
34 ippadi Avan Pesugaiyil, Oru Megam Vandhu Avargalmel Nizhalittadhu, Avargal Andha Megaththukkul Piravesikaiyil Seeshargal Payandhaargal.
35 appozhudhu: Ivar Ennudaiya Nesakumaaran, Ivarukkuch Sevikodungal Endru Megaththilirundhu Oru Saththamundaayitru.
36 andhach Saththam Undaagaiyil Yesu Oruvare Kaanappattaar. Thaangal Kandavaigalil Ondraiyum Avargal Annaatkalil Oruvarukkum Sollaamal Adakkivaiththirundhaargal.
37 marunaalil Avargal Malaiyilirundhiranginapodhu, Thiralaana Janangal Avarukku Edhirkonduvandhaargal.
38 avargalil Oruvan Saththamittu: Podhagare, En Maganaik Kadaatchiththarula Vendumendru Ummai Vendikkollugiren, Avan Enakku Ore Pillaiyaayirukkiraan.
39 oru Aavi Avanaip Pidikkiradhu, Appozhudhu Avan Alarugiraan. Adhu Avanai Nuraithalla Alaikkazhiththu Avanaik Kasakkinapinbum, Avanai Vittu Neenguvadhu Aridhaayirukkiradhu.
40 adhaith Thuraththividumpadi Ummudaiya Seesharai Vendikkonden, Avargalaal Koodaamarpoyitru Endraan.
41 yesu Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Visuvaasamillaadha Maarubaadaana Sandhadhiye, Edhuvaraikkum Naan Ungalodirundhu, Ungalidaththil Porumaiyaayiruppen? Un Maganai Inge Konduvaa Endraar.
42 avan Sameepiththuvarugaiyil, Pisaasu Avanaik Keezhe Thalli, Alaikkazhiththadhu. Yesu Andha Asuththa Aaviyai Adhatti, Ilaignanaik Gunamaakki, Avan Thagappanidaththil Avanai Oppukkoduththaar.
43 appozhudhu Ellaarum Dhevanudaiya Magaththuvaththaik Kuriththup Biramiththaargal. Yesu Seydha Yaavaiyunkuriththu Anaivarum Aachchariyappadugaiyil Avar Thammudaiya Seeshargalai Nokki:
44 neengal Indha Vaarththaigalaik Gavanamaaik Kelungal; Manushakumaaran Manushar Kaigalil Oppukkodukkappadappogiraar Endraar.
45 avargal Andha Vaarththaiyin Karuththai Arindhukollavillai; Adhu Avargalukkuth Thondraamal Maraiporulaayirundhadhu, Andha Vaarththaiyaikkuriththu Avaridaththil Visaarikkavum Bayandhaargal,
46 pinbu Thangalil Evan Periyavanaayiruppaanengira Vaakkuvaadham Avargalukkul Undaayitru.
47 yesu Avargal Irudhayaththin Yosanaiyai Arindhu, Oru Sirupillaiyai Eduththu, Adhaith Thamadharuge Niruththi,

48 avargalai Nokki: Indhach Sirupillaiyai En Naamaththinimiththam Etrukkollugiravan Ennai Etrukkollugiraan; Ennai Etrukkollugiravan Ennai Anuppinavarai Etrukkollugiraan; Ungalellaarukkullum Evan Siriyavanaayirukkiraano Avane Periyavanaayiruppaan Endraar.

49 appozhudhu Yovaan Avarai Nokki: Aiyare, Oruvan Ummudaiya Naamaththinaale Pisaasugalaith Thuraththugiradhai Naangal Kandu, Avan Engaludanekooda Ummaip Pinbatraadhavanaanapadiyaal, Avanaith Thaduththom Endraan.
50 adharku Yesu: Thadukkavendaam; Namakku Virodhiyaayiraadhavan Namadhu Patchaththilirukkiraan Endraar.
51 pinbu, Avar Eduththukkollappadum Naatkal Sameebiththapodhu, Avar Erusalemukkup Pogath Thamadhu Mugaththaiththiruppi,
52 thamakku Munnaagath Thoodhargalai Anuppinaar. Avargal Poi, Avarukku Idaththai Aayaththampannumpadi Samaariyarudaiya Oru Giraamaththile Piravesiththaargal.
53 avar Erusalemukkup Poga Nokkamaayirundhapadiyinaal Avvooraar Avarai Etrukkollavillai.

54 avarudaiya Seesharaagiya Yaakkobum Yovaanum Adhaik Kandapodhu: Aandavare, Eliyaa Seydhadhupola, Vaanaththilirundhu Akkini Irangi Ivargalai Azhikkumpadi Naangal Kattalaiyida Umakkuch Siththamaa Endru Kettaargal.
55 avar Thirumbippaarththu: Neengal Inna Aaviyullavargalenbadhai Ariyeergal Endru Adhatti,
56 manushakumaaran Manusharudaiya Jeevanai Azhikkiradharku Alla, Ratchikkiradharke Vandhaar Endraar. Adhanpinbu Avargal Veroru Giraamaththukkup Ponaargal.
57 avargal Vazhiyile Pogaiyil Oruvan Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Neer Enge Ponaalum Ummaip Pinpatrivaruven Endraan.
58 adharku Yesu: Narigalukkuk Kuzhigalum Aagaayaththup Paravaigalukkuk Koodugalum Undu, Manushakumaaranukko Thalaisaaikka Idamillai Endraar.
59 veroruvanai Avar Nokki: Ennaip Pinpatrivaa Endraar. Adharku Avan: Aandavare, Munbu Naan Poi En Thagappanai Adakkampanna Enakku Uththaravu Kodukkavendum Endraan.
60 adharku Yesu: Mariththor Thangal Mariththorai Adakkampannattum; Nee Poi, Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaikkuriththup Pirasangi Endraar.
61 pinbu Veroruvan Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Ummaip Pinpatruven, Aanaalum Munbu Naan Poi Veettilirukkiravargalidaththil Anuppuviththukkonduvarumpadi Enakku Uththaravu Kodukkavendum Endraan.
62 adharku Yesu: Kalappaiyinmel Than Kaiyai Vaiththup Pinnittuppaarkkira Evanum Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththukkuth Thagudhiyullavan Alla Endraar.
